alert.note: Alert for Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Westchester; Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 11:59AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Passaic, Bergen, Westchester, Bronx, Rockland and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1155 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from New City to Passaic. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Locally heavy rain and isolated lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding on roadways and reduced visibility. Potential for lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Passaic, Hackensack, New City, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ossining, Ridgewood, Peekskill, Monsey, Rutherford, Nanuet, Haverstraw, Tarrytown and Ridgefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with some of these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Westchester; Rockland; Southern Westchester
